Room.Name: Ashton River Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking beside the Ashton River, high above the Enchanted Forest.
Room.LongDescription: You are at the point along the trail where the species of trees is changing. the trees that grow on the lower part of the trail are different from those up higher. this is the place where the mountains start and the Enchanted Forest ends. Or is it where the mountains end and the forest starts?
